Description: Mould for a copper alloy or silver handle of a cup or mirror.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Nottingham Castle Museum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Unprovenanced parallel in Bonn (Schmidt 1997, no. 33, pl.15). Schmidt, S. 1997. Katalog der Ptolemäischen und Kaiserzeitlichen objekte aus Ägypten im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn, Munich.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (TI.13)
